name: iso-Sphere
description:
Wishlist our new game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001520/Space_Rift/

Description

A simple and colorful ball-rolling platformer with elements of puzzle game. Complete all five unique worlds and beat time records on all 68 levels.

Features:

  • 68 levels spread over 5 themed worlds.
  • Stars to collect and time records to set.
  • Ball skins to choose from.
  • Partial gamepad support.
  • Original soundtrack.
